bibl.title: Greek Lyric Poetry. The Poems and Fragments of the Greek Iambic, Elegiac, and Melic Poets (excluding Pindar and Bacchylides) down to 450 B.C. Translated with Introduction and Notes. (World's Classics.)
bibl.note: WEST Martin L., Greek Lyric Poetry. The Poems and Fragments of the Greek Iambic, Elegiac, and Melic Poets (excluding Pindar and Bacchylides) down to 450 B.C. Translated with Introduction and Notes. (World's Classics.)
Oxford - New York, Oxford University Press, 1994, 8°, xxv-213 pp. ISBN 0-19-282360-4. £5.99.
